verbs.description: [V: According] to his exam results , Trump is said to be in " excellent " overall health .
According to his exam results , Trump [V: is] said to be in " excellent " overall health .
[ARGM-ADV: According to his exam results] , [ARG1: Trump] is [V: said] [C-ARG1: to be in " excellent " overall health] .
According to his exam results , [ARG1: Trump] is said to [V: be] [ARG2: in " excellent " overall health] .
